page.prototype: $rcn(ELEMENT as element/string/array of ELEMENTs, CLASSNAME as string)
page.description: The $rcn() function removes the class name from the passed-in element(s). This will only remove the specified class name. You might want to use this to remove some temporary styling to an element, such as a focus, or error style. This function is typically used after the $acn() function has been used to add a class name to an element.
page.important: Use *[link:{dialog.object}.getPointer()@ux component getpointer method]* to get the DOM element for a control.
